sources.title: Cannon Fodder | FULL MOVIE | Zombie Thriller
sources.description:
A security operative leads an elite task force into Lebanon to capture the leader of a terrorist organization, only to encounter hellish zombies rising from the dead!

#zombie #zombies #movie #fullmoviefree #action #thriller #bmovie #undead #lebanon #specialforces #military

sources.title: Cannon Fodder | FULL MOVIE | "Battle of the Undead" | Horror, Action
sources.description:
Doron Geva, a security operative, is sent into Lebanon to capture the leader of the terrorist organization of Hezbollah. Very soon he discovers that there is a new and unknown enemy to be dealt with. Doron has to deal with an impending I.D.F attack and a bloodthirsty enemy. It's up to him to wage a new war, to find an antidote, get back across the border, before the Middle East conflict is changed forever.

Directed by Eitan Gafney
2013
Stars: Liron Levo, Yafit Shalev, and Roi Miller 
Also known as "Battle of the Undead"

metadata.Plot: A day in the life of a young boy living in a country that routinely fires large cannons at an unknown enemy.
metadata.Actors: Jack Britton, E.A. Castillo, Hisao Egawa
